alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 10:36AM CST until March 07 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi affecting White, Wayne and Gallatin Counties. .Dry conditions will result in river levels slowly falling the rest of the week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 31.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Sunday evening and continue falling to 20.3 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
